reviewText: If you are from Rhode Island or nearby Massachusetts and love hockey, this is a must.  Also if you are from Minn or Mich, see how they produce players from here.  A little slow during the Providence Reds history, but excellent when they get to High School Hockey.  If you have a kid entering or playing high school hockey, this will get him moving on the ice!

Great story!  More Mounties should have been interviewed. We enjoyed watching and reminiscing about MSC, Woonsocket,and the Great State of RI.  Highly informative, inspirational and historically accurate.  Ya gotta believe....God bless.
